description:
Set the mood at your picnic table, light the camp kitchen, or turn on the rainbow colour cycling and have a dance party with your little campers. This compact lantern fits in the palm of your hand and becomes endlessly useful around camp, or around home in a power outage. With the AlpenGlow Mini, a little light goes a long way.

  • ChromaReal LED technology produces a warm white that has excellent colour reproduction
  • Colour LEDs cycle through the colours of the rainbow, stop on the right one for your situation, or the one that makes you smile
  • Lighting modes: high 150 lumens (5 hours), low 5 lumens (40 hours), warm white, 1 colour, multicolour cycling that you can speed up or slow down
  • Dimming function dials in brightness
  • Single button or shake the lantern to cycle though modes
  • Dual sided design lights up 1 side or both
  • LED indicator shows charging progress and battery status
  • IPX4 weatherproofing keeps the light shining in even pouring rain. 1 USB port (type A) for powering other devices
  • Internal 1000mAh battery recharges via USB-C
  • Dimensions: 7.5 x 5.1cm
  • Bungee loop on the bottom for hanging the lantern
name: BioLite AlpenGlow Mini Lantern
